column5: My grandmother just sent me the following email.  So I googled it to get the pic's online rather then upload them.  some are very well done!  Animal Sculptures Made From Horseshoes Tom Hill is a 23 year-old self-taught sculptor who creates life-size animal sculptures using nothing but recycled horseshoes.
Really great work! He should be proud.

As A card burying I ment carrieing member of Pe%ta , How can you call this art when so so many poor poor horses have to go to school without any shoes , think of all these shoeless equines , walking thu the cold cold ground without any footwear because some  artist guy / women , used them for this . Save the horses shoes now !!!!!! occupy the black smiths now
That some nice art work.  Some people blow my mine.  I never would have thought to make sculptures out of horseshoes..
And the seat belt thread was closed...
Google his name and see the rest as some are real good.  C.B., LOL!
